subject: Simsonn shipping
description_text:
Hello, I had ordered the simsonn plus x pedals and the 2 piece vam pro set
through Amazon. They are expected to be here this weekend, while the pedals
are shipping from the US (where I’m at), the Vam pro’s are shipping
globally I think through SFexpress. I’ve been tracking my pedals as I’ve
seen updates but my Vam pro shopping with SFexpress hasn’t updated since
December 28th. My tracking number is
SF6047206612732

Thank you!

conversations.body_text:
I also put in a ticket through Amazon and they had brought up sending a
replacement as it might have been lost in the warehouse. I responded
through Amazon also but Yes I do want a replacement set sent if it’s lost
and wanting the Vertical Mounting Brackets as shown in the Amazon picture.

On Tue, Jan 6, 2026 at 9:37 AM service@simsonn.com
